name: SitecoreAzureVstsDeployer
description: Release task for deploying Sitecore to Azure
helpMarkDown: Information on how to use the task: [See repository](https://github.com/akuryan/vsts.extensions/tree/master/SitecoreDeployer)
author: Anton Kuryan

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Classic Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Classic subscription to configure before running PowerShell

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: Azure RM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to configure before running PowerShell

inputs.name: armTemplatePath
inputs.label: ARM template path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter path to ARM template file (it shall be on agent FS - for examples, published as build artifact)

inputs.name: armParametersPath
inputs.label: ARM parameters path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter path to ARM parameters file (it shall be on agent FS - for examples, published as build artifact)

inputs.name: location
inputs.label: Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select your resource group location. If it is not present there - than for Infra deployment type - it will be created

inputs.name: deploymentType
inputs.label: Deployment type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select deployment type according to definition: Infrastructure creates required resources; Msdeploy - deploys vanilla Sitecore and clean databases; Redeploy - deploys vanilla Sitecore without databases

inputs.name: generateSas
inputs.label: Generate SAS?
inputs.helpMarkDown: If Sitecore deploy packages are situated on storage account, belonging to current subscription - powershell script will generate short-living SAS to access them

inputs.name: licenseLocation
inputs.label: License location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please, select where license is located: Inline - paste license.xml content to multiline field; URL - enter URL, where valid license.xml could be downloaded; Filesystem - enter path, where license.xml is located on agent FS; none - license.xml content is added to ARM template already

inputs.name: inlineLicense
inputs.label: Inline license.xml
inputs.defaultValue: # You shall put your license.xml content here

inputs.name: urlToLicense
inputs.label: License.xml URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Put URL to license.xml here. If it is located on storage account, belonging to current subscription and Generate SAS? is set to Yes - shortliving SAS will be generated automatically

inputs.name: pathToLicense
inputs.label: License.xml path on FileSystem
inputs.helpMarkDown: Put path to license.xml location on agent FS
